Data: Praveen to Warner, no run good length and straight first up, Warner stays in his crease, gets squared up a touch and defends
Praveen to Warner, no run good length on a similar line, going across the left-hander, Warner taps the ball on the leg side
Praveen to Warner, 2 runs a touch shorter and on leg stump, Warner moves back and across and taps the ball through square leg, the batsmen run hard and take two on this large outfield
Praveen to Warner, 1 run pushed off the back foot once again through square leg, this delivery came back into Warner off the pitch
Praveen to Finch, no run Finch pushes with hard hands at a ball that pitches on a length outside off, hits it uppishly but bounces well short of the fielder at cover point

Praveen to Finch, FOUR runs width outside off stump and Finch tries to blaze the ball through the off side, he gets a thick outside edge which carries the ball high over the head of the only slip catcher
Vinay to Warner, 1 run Vinay is massively lucky to escape there, he began with a leg-stump full toss and Warner mis-timed the whip behind square. Finch sets off quickly and steals the single
Vinay to Finch, FOUR runs too full and straight, Finch stays on his crease and tees off, lifting the ball over midwicket and to the boundary
Vinay to Finch, no run width offered outside off and this time Finch middles the cut, he doesn't beat cover point through
Vinay to Finch, 1 run tapped off the back foot close on the leg side for a quick single
Vinay to Warner, 1 wide he's lucky again, Vinay sprayed this one far down leg side, Dhoni had to dive full length to his right to prevent five wides
Vinay to Warner, no run short of a length outside off, Warner defends on the back foot on the off side

Vinay to Warner, FOUR runs not so lucky this time is Vinay, Warner attempts to whip the ball off his pads through midwicket but eventually places it wide of the fielder at short fine leg, poor line from the bowler
Praveen to Finch, 1 run cut off the back foot through backward point

Praveen to Warner, OUT caught at deep square leg! Warner took on Praveen, trying to pull off the front foot and clear what is a huge boundary. He didn't make proper contact and sent the ball soaring. Gambhir back-pedaled to get into position and judged the catch well a few yards in from the boundary
Praveen to Finch, 1 run played off the back foot on the leg side
Praveen to Marsh, no run full and straight, Marsh pushes off the front foot towards midwicket

Praveen to Marsh, OUT edged and juggled once, juggled twice and finally caught! Marsh pushes forward at a delivery that slants across him and edges to Virender Sehwag's left at first slip. Sehwag fumbles on the first attempt and tumbles, as he tumbles he reaches out to tap the ball further in the air, so Dhoni, who moved to his left, can take the catch
Praveen to Hussey, no run David Hussey lets his first ball go close to off stump
Vinay to Finch, no run length ball with width outside off, Finch cuts to the fielder at point
Vinay to Finch, no run Vinay hits a good length, drawing Finch into the front-foot drive, and then nips the ball away from the right-hander, beating the bat
Vinay to Finch, FOUR runs short and wide outside off, Finch pounces, cutting the ball with power through point, poor ball
Vinay to Finch, 2 runs wide outside off again, this time the length is fuller so Finch square drives and opens the face to guide towards third man
Vinay to Finch, 1 run there's room to cut from Vinay and Finch does so, hitting the ball crisply towards third man
Vinay to Hussey, no run David Hussey's let his second ball go through to the keeper as well
Praveen to Finch, 1 wide Praveen strays down leg side, Finch misses the glance
Praveen to Finch, no run Finch tries to cut one that's outside of and bottom-edges it into the ground
Praveen to Finch, 2 runs Finch moves across to flick and gets an inside edge on to pad as the ball goes towards square leg, there was a small appeal for lbw from Praveen
Praveen to Finch, no run played off the back foot on the off side
Praveen to Finch, FOUR runs short and wide outside off and Finch smashes it, smashes it off the front foot, with his back leg bent, and a full swing of his bat, lovely square cut
Praveen to Finch, FOUR runs so the length is fuller outside off now and Finch moves forward and drives with power into the gap between cover and mid-off, the boundary is huge but the timing is good
Praveen to Finch, 1 run punched off the back foot towards wide mid-off, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the running was too swift
Vinay to Finch, no run good length and straight, no width this time so Finch gets behind the line and defends towards the bowler
Vinay to Finch, 1 run pushed towards mid-on for a single
Vinay to Hussey, no run Hussey tries to cut but fails to connect, he hasn't put bat on ball yet
Vinay to Hussey, no run now he charges, makes room and swings wildly at a length ball outside off. No contact once again. That's four out of four.
Vinay to Hussey, no run five out of five. Hussey stays in his crease and prods at a good length ball that pitches around off and seams away from the right hander. Top stuff from the bowler.
Vinay to Hussey, 2 runs Hussey gets going by playing the ball off the back foot behind point, first time he's hit it this evening
Kohli to Finch, 1 run a little width outside off and Finch waits in his crease and dabs to third man
Kohli to Hussey, no run played back to the bowler
Kohli to Hussey, 1 run full ball around off or just outside, driven off the front foot through extra cover
Kohli to Finch, FOUR runs Kohli bowls a friendly full toss on the stumps, Finch made room by moving towards leg and smashed the ball through extra cover
Kohli to Finch, 1 run driven to long-on for a single

Kohli to Hussey, OUT Finch has been run out! By two yards. Hussey dabbed the ball towards backward point and set off, Finch responded quickly. Jadeja was quicker at point, running to his left, picking up cleanly, and firing the throw on the move back to Dhoni, who broke the stumps with Finch well short
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run Australia reach 50 after Hussey forces the ball to long on
Jadeja to Bailey, 2 runs cut off the back foot for a single
Jadeja to Bailey, no run played back to the bowler
Jadeja to Bailey, no run played towards short third man
Jadeja to Bailey, 1 run sightly shorter from Jadeja, cut off the back foot to deep point
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run played off the back foot through cover point once again
Sharma to Hussey, no run an appeal for lbw as Hussey goes back to work the ball on the leg side, the ball hit him on the thigh so it was too high
Sharma to Hussey, no run played off the back foot towards midwicket

Sharma to Hussey, OUT Jadeja again and another run out! Hussey cut the ball towards Jadeja's left at backward point. He didn't want to run for Jadeja had moved quickly and made a sliding save. Bailey, however, had run a long way down from the non-striker's end. Jadeja got to his feet quickly and threw to Rahul Sharma, who broke the stumps with Bailey not in the frame
Sharma to Hussey, FOUR runs a long hop, Hussey goes back and pulls the ball into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary, a poor ball to release the pressure
Sharma to Hussey, no run played to midwicket off the back foot
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run pushed towards long-on for a single
Raina to Hussey, 1 run driven past the diving bowler towards long-on
Raina to Wade, no run driven off the front foot towards cover
Raina to Wade, 1 run is that a third run-out? No, it isn't. Wade's out-stretched dive saved him.
Raina to Hussey, 1 run driven off the front foot towards long-on
Raina to Wade, 1 run Wade moves forward to drive one that angles into him towards deep point
Raina to Hussey, SIX runs that is a colossal hit from Hussey. He got under a full ball and swung with might, sending the ball over the bowler's head and several rows back beyond this large boundary
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run punched off the back foot towards cover, there's a throw at the non-striker's end and Ashwin doesn't collect, the backing up is poor too
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run played to long-on for a single
Ashwin to Wade, no run nudged off the front foot towards backward point
Ashwin to Wade, 1 wide that's a quicker ball down leg side
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run driven to long on for another single
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run played to long on for another single
Ashwin to Wade, 2 runs Wade heaves at the ball, sending it high towards deep midwicket where Gambhir fields
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run punched off the back foot through cover point
Sharma to Wade, no run Wade drives but hits it towards the bowler, Hussey scrambles to get back to safety
Sharma to Wade, SIX runs that's gone a long, long way! Wade gets down on one knee and pulverises the flighted delivery over the deep square leg boundary
Sharma to Wade, 1 run played to long off for a single
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run Hussey rotates strike with a push to long off
Sharma to Wade, 2 runs Wade drives the ball through estra cover to the fielder in the deep
Ashwin to Hussey, no run quicker and straighter ball, defended by the batsman
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run played towards midwicket for one
Ashwin to Wade, no run another quicker ball that angles into the left-hander from round the wicket, punched off the back foot to point
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run driven past the diving fielder at cover
Ashwin to Hussey, 1 run that's one of his soduku balls but the line is on the pads, worked behind square
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run driven towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run nudged off the pads off the front foot towards midwicket, Jadeja, who is the bowler, sprints after it
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 wide strays down leg side, that's a wide
Jadeja to Hussey, no run played off the pads towards midwicket

Jadeja to Hussey, OUT caught and bowled! Hussey's popped one straight back to the bowler, one of the easier return chances Jadeja will take in his career. He slower the pace on the ball and it stopped on Hussey as he tried to drive on the leg side
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run Mitchell Marsh gets off the mark by driving to long-on
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run quicker ball, driven with power to mid-off
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run nudged off the front foot towards point
Ashwin to Marsh, no run driven firmly but to the fielder at cover
Ashwin to Marsh, 1 run Marsh goes back and plays the ball to long-on
Ashwin to Wade, 2 runs Wade waits in his crease and opens the face to drive the ball between backward point and short third man
Ashwin to Wade, no run defended towards point
Ashwin to Wade, no run short ball outside off, Wade backs away to hit it hard but places it to the man at cover
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run played through cover this time to bring up the 100 for Australia
Jadeja to Wade, FOUR runs Wade moves back to cut the ball hard but gets a thick outside edge that goes between the keeper and short third man
Jadeja to Wade, no run quicker ball outside off, Wade is beaten on the cut
Jadeja to Wade, 1 run nudged off the front foot towards fine leg
Jadeja to Marsh, no run good length and straight, Marsh defends on the leg side
Jadeja to Marsh, no run Marsh tries to make room but can only drive the ball to backward point
Jadeja to Marsh, 1 run pushed into the covers for a single
Ashwin to Marsh, FOUR runs a full toss outside off stump and Marsh smashes it to the cover boundary with a flowing drive, poor ball with lots of width
Ashwin to Marsh, no run driven towards mid-on
Ashwin to Marsh, 1 run strays on to the pads this time and Marsh sweeps to fine leg

Ashwin to Wade, 2 runs Wade makes room, gets down on one knee and sweeps in the air towards deep square leg, the boundary is so large they can take two even though the ball didn't go too far away from Gambhir
Ashwin to Wade, 1 run makes room and drives through cover for a single
Ashwin to Marsh, no run defended back to the bowler
Sharma to Wade, 1 run short ball, Wade moves back and pulls towards Praveen at deep backward square leg

Sharma to Marsh, FOUR runs edged and four! Marsh was coming forward and then stopped, he was moving towards leg and then stopped. He finally cut at a quicker ball and edged it past Dhoni to the third-man boundary

Sharma to Marsh, OUT that is a lightning stumping from Dhoni. He collected the ball so close to the bails that he barely had to move to take them off, just a mere push forward. Marsh had stretched forward to drive on the off side and dragged his back foot out of his crease just a little
Sharma to Lee, 1 run Lee goes back and dabs the ball on the leg side for a single
Sharma to Wade, 1 run that's not short enough to pull and Wade mis-times it through square leg
Sharma to Lee, no run Lee goes back and defends on the off side, he wants a single but is sent back by Wade, as Rahul Sharma runs to his left and fields
Vinay to Wade, no run he starts with a slow bouncer from round the wicket, angling into Wade who leans back to steer towards third man but is beaten

Vinay to Wade, OUT a direct hit from cover and Wade's gone! The ball was full outside off, Wade drove it with power along the ground to Rohit Sharma, who was in the circle. He fielded cleanly and, seeing that Lee had sent Wade back, took his time, lined up the stumps and threw them down. Wade dived full length but it wasn't enough
Vinay to McKay, OUT edged and caught! McKay pokes at a good length ball that leaves the right-hander and Dhoni dives to his right to take a low catch
Vinay to Hogg, no run Hogg stays on his crease and steers the ball to backward point
Vinay to Hogg, no run played off the back foot towards cover
Vinay to Hogg, FOUR runs it ends with Hogg making room to a length ball and cutting hard, beating the fielder at backward point diving to his right, and the fielder at third man running to his left
Sharma to Lee, FOUR runs Lee goes back to cut the ball from his stumps but gets an outside edge that goes between Dhoni at short third man, the length was a bit short
Sharma to Lee, 1 run Lee makes room and pulls the ball to long-on
Sharma to Hogg, OUT Hogg moved across his stumps to work the ball on the leg side but was trapped plumb by a fuller ball

Sharma to Doherty, 1 run, OUT worked off the pads through midwicket and the fourth run-out ends the innings. Raina came sprinting in from the deep, picked up the ball with one hand and threw accurately to Dhoni, who collected the ball over the bails and ran out Doherty

India have been outstanding in the field, which is a refreshing change from their previous performances on this tour. A target of 132 probably gives them their best shot at a first win on this tour, since the Boxing Day Test at this venue.
The IPL auction is tomorrow by the way and here's our preview of it. Jadeja is one of the 144 players on sale and wasn't he in hot form on the field today.
Sehwag and Gambhir are out there, beginning this chase. Brett Lee stands at the top of his mark, he's going to steam in from over the wicket. Gambhir to face ...
Lee to Gambhir, no run good length outside off stump, Gambhir defends on the front foot towards cover
Lee to Gambhir, FOUR runs short of a length down leg side, Gambhir whips the ball off his hips, he's hit it in the air, flat and fast over the leaping David Warner at short fine leg
Lee to Gambhir, 1 wide full and far outside off stump, that's a wide
Lee to Gambhir, no run good length and straight this time, defended from the crease on the off side
Lee to Gambhir, no run good length at brisk pace outside off stump, Gambhir tries to cover drive but gets beaten, Wade appeals for a caught behind
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run full ball outside off, Gambhir square drives behind point for a single
Lee to Sehwag, no run Sehwag tries to drive his first ball through cover but it was a bit too full for the back-foot drive, he gets beaten outside off
McKay to Gambhir, no run good length and straight from over the wicket, Gambhir defends on the back foot
McKay to Gambhir, no run length delivery angling across the left-hander, Gambhir tries to steer towards third man but is beaten
McKay to Gambhir, no run Gambhir backs away and tries to blast the good length ball through the off side, he doesn't make contact
McKay to Gambhir, no run short of a length close to off stump, cut off the back foot to the fielder at point
McKay to Gambhir, 1 wide short of a length down leg side, Wade tumbles to his right to collect
McKay to Gambhir, FOUR runs there's some width outside off and Gambhir dabs the ball wide of the slip cordon and places it fine enough to beat third man
McKay to Gambhir, no run good length delivery pitching around off and angling away from Gambhir, who lets it go
Lee to Sehwag, FOUR runs too full and too straight, Sehwag helps himself to a boundary with an easy flick off the pads through backward square leg
Lee to Sehwag, no run defended off the back foot on the off side, the length was good and the line off stump
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run Sehwag moves back and works the ball off his hips in front of square leg
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir stays in his crease and opens the face to steer a length ball behind point
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run Sehwag waits in his crease and drives a slightly slower delivery between cover and mid-off
Lee to Gambhir, no run Gambhir defends a good length ball from his crease, Lee runs across to prevent the batsmen stealing a run
McKay to Sehwag, 1 run good length outside off stump, Sehwag pushes towards cover point and sets off for a very quick single
McKay to Gambhir, 1 run a slower ball on the pads, Gambhir plays it through square leg
McKay to Sehwag, FOUR runs short of a length outside off, not much room there but Sehwag cuts it fine, between the seagull at gully and the fielder at slip
McKay to Sehwag, 1 run Sehwag jumps back and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
McKay to Gambhir, no run Gambhir punches the length ball fluently towards cover point
McKay to Gambhir, 1 run a slower ball short of a length on the hips, Gambhir works it off his body towards square leg
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run short of a length just outside off, Gambhir opens the face as the ball climbs, steering it behind point, Sehwag calls him through for a single
Lee to Sehwag, no run that's a quick and well-directed bouncer, very straight, Sehwag ducks under it, turning his head away from the ball
Lee to Sehwag, no run good length and straight, Sehwag punches back to the bowler
Lee to Sehwag, 1 run Sehwag tries to drive through the off side but gets a thick outside edge, the seagull has moved out of gully so there's nothing in the way as the ball goes towards third man
Lee to Gambhir, no run Gambhir plays a loose waft off the back foot at a good length delivery that speeds past his off stump and is beaten
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run dabbed off the back foot with an open face, the ball beats the fielder at backward point
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run full ball on the pads, played towards short fine leg

Doherty to Sehwag, SIX runs Sehwag has charged Doherty and slammed him high and far over the straight boundary, his first ball against the spinner and that's 15 rows back at least. It's been caught in the stands, top effort.
Doherty to Sehwag, 3 runs Sehwag attacks Doherty again and hits him uppishly through square leg, shouts of catch but it was wide of the fielder
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run played off the pads behind square
Doherty to Sehwag, 1 run Sehwag comes out of his crease and drives a quicker and fuller ball past the bowler
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir steps out this time and drives the ball to long-on
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run nudged off the pads on the front foot on the leg side
Hogg to Sehwag, no run Sehwag cleared his front foot to make room but then played the googly back to the bowler
Hogg to Kohli, no run Kohli goes back and defends
Hogg to Kohli, 2 runs width outside off stump and Kohli plays a flashy cut, along the ground to the fielder at deep point
Hogg to Kohli, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run Kohli moves back and cuts the ball hard in front of cover point
Doherty to Gambhir, no run left alone outside off stump
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run played to midwicket for a single
Doherty to Kohli, 1 wide that's too wide outside off stump
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run Kohli goes back and cuts the ball late in front of the fielder at backward point, India reach 50
Doherty to Gambhir, 3 runs Gambhir goes deep into his crease and cuts the ball late through backward point, Kohli runs hard and pushes Gambhir for the third
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run driven to long off for a single
Hogg to Kohli, FOUR runs Kohli reaches out for a delivery that floats across him and gets an outside edge past the keeper to the third man boundary, that was the googly from the chinaman
Hogg to Kohli, 1 run shorter length and Kohli goes back and pulls to the deep square leg boundary
Hogg to Gambhir, FOUR runs Gambhir steps out, gets to the pitch of the ball and chips it over the infield to the extra cover boundary
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run played wide of the fielder at cover for a single
Hogg to Kohli, 1 run Kohli dabs the ball towards point and runs
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run flatter ball on the pads, played towards square leg

Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run a slower ball on a good length, Gambhir drops it at his feet and looks up to see Kohli charging through for a single, Marsh sprints, dives and attempts to parry the ball on to the stumps, Kohli dives and makes it, Marsh misses. It's all happening.
Marsh to Kohli, no run defended from the crease towards cover
Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs short ball and Kohli pulls the ball towards deep midwicket, Gambhir runs hard for the second and beats Brett Lee's throw
Marsh to Kohli, no run Kohli was on the front foot to a good length ball and was beaten as he tried to defend
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run played towards long on for a single
Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run short of a length and slower, Gambhir gets on top of the bounce and opens the face to steer the ball towards third man
Hussey to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir uses the angle into him to work the ball towards short fine leg
Hussey to Kohli, 1 run driven to long on for one more
Hussey to Gambhir, no run quicker ball hits Gambhir on the pads as he tries to play on the leg side, that was missing leg
Hussey to Gambhir, 2 runs Gambir chips the ball over the infield at cover once again
Hussey to Gambhir, no run Gambhir pushes forward and closes the face to play the ball towards square leg
Hussey to Gambhir, 2 runs once again Gambhir goes inside out, chipping the ball over cover into the open spaces in the deep, he's not hitting hard, just placing well
Doherty to Kohli, no run hit hard off the back foot towards extra cover where Bailey makes a five save
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run full and straight, Kohli drives to long off
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run cuts off the back foot towards the fielder in the deep
Doherty to Kohli, FOUR runs that's short and Kohli goes right back and pulls the ball powerfully along the ground to the midwicket boundary
Doherty to Kohli, 1 run another short ball but this time Kohli mis-times the pull slightly, hitting it through square leg
Doherty to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir goes back and dabs to backward point for a single
McKay to Gambhir, 1 run good length and straight, Gambhir moves his foot forward and taps the ball in front of square leg, Lee prevents the second by running in quickly from the deep
McKay to Kohli, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Kohli moves towards it and cuts in front of point
McKay to Gambhir, no run dabbed off the front foot close on the leg side, Gambhir begins to run and then stops because McKay has moved quickly to field the ball
McKay to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir tries to close the face and play the ball on the leg side, he gets a leading edge through cover
McKay to Kohli, FOUR runs Kohli's lucky there! He tried to pull a ball that wasn't too short from outside off and got a top edge that flew high over slip to the third-man boundary
McKay to Kohli, 1 run nudged from the crease on the leg side
Marsh to Kohli, 2 runs Kohli taps the ball towards wide mid-on and they run two because the fielder from the deep has to cover lots of ground
Marsh to Kohli, 1 run played off the pads towards fine leg
Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir drops the ball with soft hands close on the off side and they run a single
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run short of a length and straight, Dhoni jumps back and plays the ball towards square leg with legs splayed
Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run full and straight from Marsh, Gambhir glances the ball towards fine leg
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run full toss outside off, this time it isn't caught at extra cover. Gambhir drives it in front of point
Hogg to Dhoni, no run Dhoni goes back and pushes a googly towards cover, not sure if he read that
Hogg to Dhoni, 1 run shorter length, gives Dhoni lots of time to go back and nudge the ball off his pads behind square
Hogg to Gambhir, no run another googly which beats Gambhir's attempt to work the ball behind square
Hogg to Gambhir, 1 run shorter length this time so Gambhir can move back and tap through square leg

Hogg to Dhoni, no run that's not pretty, Hogg dropped it short but the ball bounced a bit more, Dhoni tried to play a paddle of sorts behind square but ended up hitting the ball on to his boot and towards the off side
Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run length ball on the off side, driven towards extra cover for a single
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 wide short ball down leg side, Dhoni swivels and tries to pull but can't make contact

Marsh to Dhoni, 2 runs that was quick! Dhoni hared down the pitch after pushing towards cover, beating the throw at the bowler's end, which missed the stumps. Brett Lee fumbled while backing up and the batsmen took advantage

Marsh to Dhoni, FOUR runs short ball outside off stump, Dhoni carves it with plenty of bottom hand, lurching back and jumping as he made contact, sending the ball racing to the backward point boundary
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run played off the pads through square
Marsh to Gambhir, no run a short ball that rises sharply on Gambhir, he fends awkwardly on the leg side instead of swaying and letting it go
Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run dabbed off the back foot towards third man
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run another short ball at Gambhir, who rides the bounce and opens the face to play towards third man
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run full and straight, Dhoni hammers the ball along the ground back at the bowler, the ball crashes into Lee's boot and he winces in pain
Lee to Gambhir, 1 run short of a length at the body, Gambhir drops the ball close on the leg side and runs, Lee ambles across to pick it up

Lee to Dhoni, FOUR runs Dhoni moves towards the off and pulls a short of a length delivery towards long leg, McKay runs to his right on the boundary and slides, he gets a hand on the ball but it trickles past him to the boundary
Lee to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni swivels and pulls once again to McKay on the fine leg boundary
Lee to Gambhir, no run short of a length and straight, Gambhir stays in his crease and defends towards point
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run short ball and Dhoni pulls it hard towards the fielder on the midwicket boundary
Marsh to Gambhir, no run short of a length outside off, with only 11 to get off 17 balls, Gambhir can afford the luxury of letting it go
Marsh to Gambhir, 3 runs Gambhir gets to his fifty by dabbing a full toss off his pads behind square, and then running for the overthrow. He's steered this chase rather well
Marsh to Dhoni, 3 runs Dhoni's played a tennis shot of sorts, clubbing the ball with the bottom of the bat towards deep midwicket, not very aesthetic
Marsh to Gambhir, 1 run worked off the pads through square leg
Marsh to Dhoni, 1 run length ball outside off, Dhoni steers it through point and retains strike with three to get
Hussey to Dhoni, no run Dhoni stays in his crease and plays to midwicket
Hussey to Dhoni, no run driven hard but to the fielder at cover
Hussey to Dhoni, 1 run worked off the pads behind square
Hussey to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir gets an outside edge as he dabs towards third man to bring the scores level
Hussey to Dhoni, no run nudged off the pads to square leg
Hussey to Dhoni, no run pushed off the front foot to cover
McKay to Gambhir, no run length ball outside off stump, cut off the back foot to point. Five balls to go ...
McKay to Gambhir, no run good length once again, Gambhir pulls but can't beat midwicket ...
McKay to Gambhir, no run that's too full outside off to try and cut and Gambhir gets beaten on the back foot, three to go ... Dhoni goes up to have a chat

McKay to Gambhir, FOUR runs this time he finds the gap, with a drive from the crease between midwicket and mid-on, India have won their first game on this tour of Australia. This tour, although terrible, will not be described as 'winless' as India's tour of England is.
Thank you for all your emails today. That's all I've got for you today. See you for the triangular series, which begins on Sunday. Cheers.
The Man of the Match is Ravindra Jadeja, for his fielding and spell of 3-0-16-1. He says he was trying to play his natural game, that's all. And a fine game it was.

10.50 pm No major celebrations from Gambhir and Dhoni, a shake of the hands and smiles as they walk off the MCG. India won this game pretty comfortably, and the victory was built by a superb fielding effort that began with Gambhir taking a good catch to dismiss Warner. Gambhir then held the chase together with a measured half-century. He'd be a favourite for Man of the Match but I'd give it
India won by 8 wickets (with 2 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Ravindra Jadeja, INDIA
